author: dain
msg: Added a plan to stop the deployment before destruction.  Since all MBeans now depend on
thier parent deployment unit, the stop will stop all MBeans in the deployment.

author: dain
msg: Added setTargetRole, so we can remember the role we assigned the target when we guess
Added created relationship flag so we can remember if we created the relationship on start
so we can remove it on stop.

author: dain
msg: Added constructors to quickly initialize the metadata.

author: dain
msg: Simply calls stop on the MBean.

author: dain
msg: Moved stop call to the StopMBeanInstance class.
DestroyMBeanInstance can not only run if all of the dependent MBean have stopped.
